text: The module is currently a mess, because it has some bounds-computing code, that is somewhat weakly-related to resampling. This should probably be spawned to another file.
title: Reorganize nilearn.image.resampling

text: Moving to 0.2.4 since a refactoring is a major change.
There appear to be no volunteers for this one. Would not @eickenberg be the perfect candidate, since he wrote big parts of the original implementation, if I remember correctly.
